#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Equipment.

= Description =

The Equipment element allow a player to keep track of its equipment, golf clubs, and golf bags.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # units - Units used in equipment description. Optional.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

None.

== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # [Club]
 # [Bag]

= Parent Elements =

 # [Player]
